question: Does Loma Linda have surgery payment plans?
question_content: I might have to get a surgery on my upper jaw and I was wondering if there is a payment plan for a surgery. I already have Medicare Part A and B, so I'm not concerned about those costs. By the way, this is for the hospital located in Loma Linda, CA

answers.answer_content: You should be able to make payment arrangements for the portion of the bill not covered by Medicare.
